summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting an easement over a portion of condemned 22nd Avenue South, a portion of condemned South 150th Street and a portion of the Northwest one-quarter of Section 21, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M. for an overflow and storm drain and detention conduit; and accepting an easement over a portion of Section 21, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M. for City's Cedar River Pipeline No. 4; and accepting a deed to a portion of Section 21, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M. for a Water Supply Reservoir. (Riverton Heights Reservoir, W.D. 292)
